definition: to pour/to pour down (of rain)/to lay a bet
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
to inject/to pour into/to concentrate/to pay attention/stake (gambling)/classifier for sums of money/variant of 註|注[zhu4]

sentences.english: acquaintances often gather to play for fun, with no wagering.
sentences.chinese: 熟人经常聚在一起打麻将玩，不下注。

sentences.english: The casino town bet big on the real estate boom-and lost.
sentences.chinese: 这家赌场下注大的城市房地产繁荣而丧失了。

sentences.english: Treatment generally consists of IV or sub-cutaneous fluids and antibiotics.
sentences.chinese: 治疗通常包括IV或者皮下注射和抗生素。

sentences.english: Hypodermic needles stuck in my shoes as I walked over to take the photo.
sentences.chinese: 当我步行去拍摄时，皮下注射的针头扎进了我的鞋子。

sentences.english: Speculation is generally defined as bets placed on future prices of assets or commodities.
sentences.chinese: 投机行为的一般定义是为资产或商品的未来价格下注。

sentences.english: The rats of normal control group were also subcutaneously injected the saline solution with the same dosage.
sentences.chinese: 正常对照组同法皮下注射相应剂量生理盐水。

sentences.english: Stem cells were mobilized with granulocyte colony-stimulating factor from HLA-identical sibling donors.
sentences.chinese: 供者采用粒细胞集落刺激因子皮下注射动员干细胞。

sentences.english: Of the bonus is immediately given to you on your first deposit and can be wagered just as fast.
sentences.chinese: 的奖金是立即给您在您的第一储蓄，可下注一样快。

sentences.english: A min-bet lead is almost always a draw.
sentences.chinese: 最小的下注几乎老是抽牌。

sentences.english: We define true definition of House Edge as the ratio of the average loss to the initial bet.
sentences.chinese: 我们所指的赌场优势是平均赔率对下注额的比率。

sentences.english: What does a bet mean on this flop?
sentences.chinese: 下注在这种翻牌时意味着什么呢？

sentences.english: I lost a lot of weight, so I had to take all my clothes in.
sentences.chinese: 我下注的那匹马跑了最后一名，所以我输了钱。

sentences.english: This play is better than calling his flop bet.
sentences.chinese: 这种打法比跟注他在翻牌圈的下注要好。

sentences.english: The bettor has hot tips for tomorrow's race.
sentences.chinese: 下注者手中有明天比赛的内部消息。

sentences.english: After injecting astragalus in the points, prepared model by hypodermic injection of scopolamine.
sentences.chinese: 穴位注射黄芪注射液后，皮下注射东莨菪碱造模。

sentences.english: I love the bloke. I want to pay out on him.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢这家伙，也愿意向下注者赔付。

definition: to throw one's energies (into an activity)/to invest one's emotions (in sth)/to bet/betting
stake (in a gamble)/(what is at) stake
gambling get-together/game of cards, mahjong etc
to bid (bridge and similar card games)
